entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How may I assist you today?
Yeah, hi. I want to return this VeloBand Pulse I bought. It's not working right, and frankly, I'm not happy with it.
I understand. I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your VeloBand Pulse. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
Ugh, hold on... Okay, it's jane.doe@email.com. I bought it like two weeks ago. This is a real pain, I need to get this returned ASAP!

Thank you, Ms. Doe. Let me quickly pull up your order. I see here you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on July 11th. Our standard return policy is 90 days, so you're well within that window. I can definitely process a return for you.
Ninety days? Seriously? I was worried I was past the deadline. Great! So how does this return work? I need to get my money back. I'm really not happy with this smart watch.

Absolutely. To initiate the return for your VeloBand Pulse, I will email you a prepaid shipping label. You can simply package the item in its original packaging, if possible, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, a full refund will be credited back to your original payment method. This typically takes 7-10 business days to reflect in your account.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. Will I get a confirmation email when you process everything?

Yes, you will receive an email confirmation once the return has been processed and the refund has been issued. Regarding the VeloBand Pulse itself, is there anything specific that you were unhappy with that you'd like to share? This feedback helps us improve our products.

Honestly, the heart rate monitor was completely off, and the battery life was terrible. I expected more. But as long as I get my refund, I'm happy. I'm past my initial frustration. Thank you for sorting this out so quickly.

You're very welcome, Ms. Doe. I understand your frustration. We appreciate your feedback regarding the VeloBand Pulse. The return label has been emailed to jane.doe@email.com. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions or concerns. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's everything. Thanks for all your help! Knowing I have almost 90 days really calmed my worries.
You're very welcome! Have a great day and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
